entry.title: Using Nothing But Docker For Projects
entry.summary: Using only Docker to build and run applications and commands removes the need for previous knowledge in some tool or programming language. Also, it avoids the necessity to install new modules and dependencies directly to the system, which makes development machine-independent.

entry.title: Accelerating UX Maturity With A Breakthrough Project
